backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining marketplace data types, vendor authorization, and in-memory maps for products, orders, carts, discounts, and profiles, with storage and access-control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI/UX updates to impacted files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence feature tracking metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and UI style of various frontend pages and components in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing fixes for TypeScript config issues and Vite environment variable shimming required for successful production builds.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind theme file defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base element styling for borders and backgrounds.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint that sets up meta tags, PWA settings, and loads the React application root container and main script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, and startup configuration for QuickBazar.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with gradient styling and a retry button for when the user has no internet connection.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first or cache-first fetch strategies with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router configuration defining routes, layouts, and role-protected pages for customer, vendor, and admin flows.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: Error boundary for admin pages that logs errors and shows a diagnostic fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminNav.t: Admin navigation tabs linking to dashboard sections with active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/admin/VendorDocu: Dialog that loads and displays vendor-submitted documents with view and download options.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper with top/bottom navigation and vendor auto-redirect logic after login.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Access denial screen with admin refresh, role assignment handling, and backend error diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBypass: Wrapper that restricts admin routes to authenticated users and redirects unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and clears cached queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save initial profile details.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-gating component that checks admin/vendor access using actor and role queries, showing loading or denial states until checks complete.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Responsive bottom navigation that adapts links based on user role and shows cart badges for customers.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Wrapper around Button that applies primary CTA styles and forwards props.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Product deal card showing image, pricing, discount, and styled deal badges linking to product detail.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Input with floating label behavior using peer styling and custom classes.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Auto-rotating hero banner slider with swipe gestures, category-based slides, and navigation to store categories.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Responsive product grid showing product cards with image, price, discount, stock status, and add‑to‑cart handling.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Badge component that renders styled order status text based on helper functions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar providing search, logo, cart count, role-based links, and login handling.
frontend/src/components/vendor/EditOutle: Dialog form for editing vendor outlet details, including photo upload and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorTab: Vendor navigation tabs that highlight the active route and link to vendor sections.
frontend/src/constants/storeCategories.t: Defines store category options with helpers for labels, parsing, and slugs.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Static mock vendor dataset with basic shop info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Reads actor query state from React Query cache via external store subscription.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication, stored identities, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, permissions, and other backend data via the actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, custom color variables, dark mode themes, and utility classes for marketplace UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details and feature cards highlighting security, quality, and delivery.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Fetches and displays admin analytics metrics including vendors, orders, sales, and commission.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin control panel with navigation cards for vendor and order management along with quick action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays and filters orders by city, shows order details, and allows updating order statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Manages product CRUD operations with a dialog form for adding and editing products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Lists vendors and provides tools to approve, reject, toggle outlet status, view documents, and mark payments.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, calculates totals, handles checkout navigation, and shows empty or loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and lists product categories using styled cards, with loading skeletons during fetch.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Shows products filtered by category with sorting options and reuses ProductGrid for display.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow, calculates totals, and submits orders while clearing the cart and validating identity.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation and simulated submission plus contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Shows the logged‑in customer’s profile details and role using Internet Identity data.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Displays a customer's order history with status indicators or an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Displays the user's wishlist by fetching products and wishlist data, showing loading skeletons, empty state, or product cards with discounts and stock badges.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays hero slider, login buttons, and category cards, and shows deal products from fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Provides a customer login form with validation, saving data to storage and redirecting to the vendor list by city.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Collects vendor outlet details including photo upload, validates input, stores the data, and redirects to the vendor dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Shows a simple vendor dashboard with registration confirmation and displays stored vendor and outlet details.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Lists vendors filtered by city, showing shop details and navigation to vendor shop pages, with empty states when needed.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Provides a vendor login form with validation, saving details including store category and redirecting to outlet details.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Displays vendor details from local data using vendorId and shows a not‑found state if missing.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Shows product details, image carousel, reviews, pricing, and allows adding to cart and submitting reviews.
frontend/src/pages/store/StoreCategoryVe: Lists vendors by store category with loading, error, and empty states plus category validation.
Shows vendor details and lets vendor owners manage products with add, edit, delete, and image upload features.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Vendor dashboard showing product count, orders, wallet due warnings, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Displays vendor orders with statuses and details, including empty and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Allows vendors to view, add, edit, and delete their products via a modal form and product list.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProfileP: Renders the vendor profile page, showing vendor details, outlet info, and loading states using hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorWalletPa: Displays vendor wallet status, commission warnings, and sales totals with conditional alerts and loading handling.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Provides deterministic color classes for categories based on a simple hash of the category ID.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Finds a category by case‑insensitive name matching within a list.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Extracts readable error messages, formats diagnostics output, and handles backend trap/reject parsing.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numbers or bigints into INR currency strings with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/maskAadhaar.ts: Masks Aadhaar numbers to show only the last four digits in a fixed pattern.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Manages saving, retrieving, and clearing onboarding data in sessionStorage for customers, vendors, and outlets.
frontend/src/utils/safeNumbers.ts: Provides safe numeric conversions and formatting helpers to prevent crashes from invalid values.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order and UI statuses to text and class names, and provides stock availability styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Defines Vite environment type declarations including optional II URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, extended radii, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Vite’s Node-side files with strict settings and ESNext module resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, path aliasing, environment shims, build chunk splitting, and dev server settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the marketplace UI theme, design system guidelines, and existing implemented features.
